p: On the other hand, it was apparent from the obtained results that most of the prepared spirooxindoles possessed moderate to modest growth inhibitory activity towards prostate cancer PC-3 cells with IC 50 in the range of 11.8 − 43.7 µM. Compounds 6a and 6e were found to be the most potent spirooxindoles towards PC-3 cells with IC 50 values equal to 11.8 and 13.5 μM, respectively. Moreover, spirooxindoles 6i, 6j and 6 m were moderately active against PC-3 cells with (IC 50 = 17.9, 26.6 and 24.3 µM, respectively).
